monthly_revenue.inference: Profitable with rent covered, 3 people team, but cautious about stability

wind_turbines.quote: Wind turbines are 50% of our revenue stream

biogas_mvp.quote: We haven't launched the MVP yet... we're testing

tire_battery_boxes.description: Recycled tire rubber insulation boxes for solar batteries

team_size.inference: Mentioned 'we' repeatedly, workshop mentioned, rent covered by Bloom

profitability.quote: I'm making a bit of profit, more than what I'm putting in... I'm earning but not losing

bloom_funding_impact.quote: If not for this fund I wouldn't be in the shop now... you allowed me to use it for rent... this simplified everything
bloom_funding_impact.differentiation: Unlike other accelerators that buy materials (bad quality, no autonomy)

innovation_problem_solving.label: passionate_solution_oriented
evidence: We researched for over a year... read many books and analyses
We solved two problems: battery efficiency + tire pollution

crisis_context.label: realistic_resilient
evidence: Your mother is sick, you don't run away... your country is your mother
Tried Germany, Canada 3 times, didn't work

bloom_program.label: very_positive_differentiated_value
evidence: The thing Bloom has that no one else has: you can use funding for rent or salaries
Other accelerators buy materials for you (bad)

sustainability_focus.label: core_identity
evidence: Our motto is 'make the world green again'

explicit_needs.evidence: Bloom should customize funding based on each business's needs... some need $3830, some need less
We're governed by policies... working with municipality and government and investor, takes time

implied_needs.inference: Biogas MVP under testing for 1.5 years - may need push to launch or validation methodology
Bilal mentioned Iraq reconstruction project - GreeNX products highly relevant but Mohamad needs intro
Novel innovation - should protect IP and/or publicize for impact

core_values.evidence: Make the world green again... solving pollution + energy problems
Your country is your mother, sick, you don't abandon her... I tried to leave 3 times but couldn't, so I continue
Need is mother of invention... electricity crisis → solar/wind/biogas innovation
Generosity and ethics come from religion... this strengthens these traits

interest_level.note: Cooperative model not explicitly discussed in this interview - focused on business and Bloom program feedback
interest_level.inference: Would likely be interested given values alignment, but needs direct conversation

readiness_assessment.reasoning: Strong values alignment + innovation capacity + environmental impact. Moderate financial stability. Multiple MVPs in pipeline suggest potential but also complexity/focus challenges. Good pilot candidate for values contribution and environmental sector representation.

specific_opportunities.description: Bilal working on Iraq post-conflict reconstruction (Mosul, 200 homes) with ITC + UN. GreeNX products (solar, insulation, sustainability) are perfect fit.

specifics.project: Green home design for 200 model homes in Mosul

specific_opportunities.description: Novel dual-impact innovation: recycled tire rubber → battery insulation boxes. Solves pollution + battery efficiency.

technical_details.problem_2: Solar battery efficiency drops in cold (Lebanon winters)
technical_details.solution: Repurpose tires → rubber insulation boxes for batteries

revenue_potential.b2b: Every solar installation needs battery boxes

meta_insights.unique_contribution: Environmental sector leadership, crisis → innovation mindset, regenerative tech
